Rationale and evidence
Wheat and maize flour fortification should be considered when industrially-produced flour is 
regularly consumed by large population groups in a country. Wheat and maize flour fortification 
programmes are expected to be most effective in achieving a public health impact if mandated at 
the national level, and can help achieve international public health goals.
